core

Class ResourceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.ResourceAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ResourceAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceListener
    An abstract adapter class for receiving resource events. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as convenience for creating listener objects.
    Author:
    Paul Chaignon

      • onVersionReceived

        public void onVersionReceived(Resource resource,
                     int status,
                     java.lang.String response)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceListener
        Called when a response has been received after a version request.
        Specified by:
        onVersionReceived in interface ResourceListener
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource.
        status - The response status, an HTTP code.
        response - The response body: the version number.

      • onVersionUpdated
